AD_FIELD.NAME: UPC/EAN
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A bar code with a number to identify a product.
AD_FIELD.HELP: Use this field to enter the bar code for the product in any of the bar code symbologies (Codabar, Code 25, Code 39, Code 93, Code 128, UPC (A), UPC (E), EAN-13, EAN-8, ITF, ITF-14, ISBN, ISSN, JAN-13, JAN-8, POSTNET and FIM, MSI/Plessey, and Pharmacode)

AD_FIELD.NAME: Percentage Discount
AD_FIELD.HELP: Percentage to be discounted from base price.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Discount/Promotion Price
AD_FIELD.HELP: Total price applied to the combination of all products participating in the Discount or Promotion.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Distribute Between Lines
AD_FIELD.HELP:
This flag affects on how the discount is computed internally but doesn't have any effect in the Web POS UI.
When a discount is distributed, the discounted amount, even shown for a concrete line, is not only computed in this one but distributed between all the lines in the ticket.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Y Units
AD_FIELD.HELP: Once "X Units" have been reached, Y represents how many of them need to be payed. For example being X 3 and Y 2, having 3 units, only 2 will be requested to be payed.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Gift Product
AD_FIELD.HELP:
This flag applies to "Buy X and get Y as Gift" discount type.
In order to be possible to apply the promotion, it is required to include in the ticket all products defined in the list of products. Those products set as gift will be completely discounted from the price.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Gift Quantity
AD_FIELD.HELP:
This field applies to "Buy X and get Y as Gift" discount type.
Using this field the gift units can be defined
In order to be possible to apply the promotion, it is required to include in the ticket all products defined in the list of products with the quantities defined by this field.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Discount Subtype
AD_FIELD.HELP: Defines which lines are affected by the discount or promotion: *'''Cheapest''': All the discount is applied to the cheapest product. *'''Average''': Discount is distributed among all products calculating the average price of all of them and applying it based on the actual amount of each of them.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Add Pack
AD_FIELD.HELP: Selecting one of the Pack Discounts, inserts in the document lines for all products included in that pack.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Organization
AD_FIELD.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Image
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A visual picture used to describe an item.
AD_FIELD.HELP: Defines a system image

AD_FIELD.NAME: Discounted Amount
AD_FIELD.HELP: Fixed amount to be discounted from base price.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Currency
AD_FIELD.HELP: Currency the price is defined in

AD_FIELD.NAME: Approval Required
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Discount requires approval from a supervisor to be applied
AD_FIELD.HELP: When a discretionary discount that requires approval is applied in POS and the ticket is about to be closed, approval from a supervisor user/role will be requested before allowing to continue.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Role
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The profile of security for the user defining what windows and tabs they can see.
AD_FIELD.HELP: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Promotion/Discount
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ability to raise or lower prices.
AD_FIELD.HELP: Promotion or Discount applied to a particular line (product) automatically by the system.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Active
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A flag indicating whether this record is available for use or de-activated.
AD_FIELD.HELP: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reporting. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for auditing purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are existing invoices for it. By de-activating the Business Partner you prevent it from being used in future transactions.

AD_FIELD.NAME: X Units
AD_FIELD.HELP: Number of units that are required to be included in order to be possible to apply the discount. Once this number is reached, the discount can be applied, so it is possible to pay Y units instead of X.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Quantity
AD_FIELD.HELP:
This field applies to "Buy X and get Y as Gift" discount type.
In order to be possible to apply the promotion, it is required to include in the ticket all products defined in the list of products with the quantities defined by this field.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Client
AD_FIELD.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Included Roles
AD_FIELD.HELP: Role Selection Mode is the way Roles will be selected for discretionary discounts applied in POS.
